attributes.action: ask the people in a national referendum what they think the minimum mandatory sentence should be when a driver who is neither qualified nor insured nor having any valid road tax certificate nor valid MOT certificate should be.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This government and their house trained judiciary have now completely abrogated their responsbility for dealing with illegal drivers who DESTROY the lives of other innocent, law-abiding citizens of this land.  It is time the people were given an opportunity to lay down in law what they consider is appropriate sentencing for crimes against society.

rejection.details: The title of your petition appears incomplete.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
